Learn.Do.Live

what you love;

Podii Academy is a Kenyan-based coding school that provides web development training.We believe in learning practically and our students are encourage to explore as they tap into their creativity.

Learn to code

Are you interested in coding ? Then you are in the right place. Podii provides a platform to learn how to build interactive web applications in our coding bootcamp. It is fun and interactive hands on skills experience

Prerequisites

Before you apply kindly ensure that

  • You are interested in learning new ideas
  • Are available for 13 weeks
  • You have a working laptop
